name: Charmander
flavorText: From the time it is born, a flame burns at the tip of its tail. Its life would end if the flame were to go out.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Charmeleon
flavorText: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the air temperature to unbearably high levels.
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon during your turn, you may discard the top 5 cards of your deck. If any of those cards are Fire Energy cards, attach them to this Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Discard an Energy from this Pokemon.

name: Charizard
flavorText: Its wings can carry this Pokemon close to an altitude of 4,600 feet. It blows out fire at very high temperatures.
Ability1Text: This Pokemon's attacks do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokemon for each of their Pokemon-GX and Pokemon-EX in play.
Attack1Text: Discard an Energy from this Pokemon.

name: Torchic
flavorText: A fire burns inside, so it feels very warm to hug. It launches fireballs of 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Combusken
flavorText: During a battle, the hot flame in its body increases. Its kicks have outstanding destructive power.
Ability1Text: Whenever you attach an Energy card from your hand to this Pokemon, remove all Special Conditions from it.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Blaziken
flavorText: When facing a tough foe, it looses flames from its wrists. Its powerful legs let it jump clear over buildings.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Fire Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Discard a Fire Energy from this Pokemon. This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Victini ◇
flavorText: When it shares the infinite energy it creates, that being's entire body will be overflowing with power.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage for each basic Energy card in your discard pile. Then, shuffle those cards into your deck.

name: Darumaka
flavorText: When it sleeps, it pulls its limbs into its body and its internal fire goes down to 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

name: Darmanitan
flavorText: Its internal fire burns at 2,500 degrees Fahrenheit, making enough power that it can destroy a dump truck with one punch.
Attack1Text: Attach up to 3 Fire Energy cards from your hand to your Pokemon in any way you like.
Attack2Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 50 more damage for each heads.

name: Heatmor
flavorText: It draws in air through its tail, transforms it into fire, and uses it like a tongue. It melts Durant and eats them.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Burned.
Attack2Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon isn't Burned, this attack does nothing.

name: Reshiram-GX
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Fire Energy cards and attach them to this Pokemon. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack2Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Litten
flavorText: While grooming itself, it builds up fur inside its stomach. It sets the fur alight and spews fiery attacks, which change based on how it coughs.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage for each heads.

name: Salandit
flavorText: Volcanoes or dry, craggy places are its home. It emanates a sweet-smelling poisonous gas that attracts bug Pokemon, then attacks them.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokemon and put it onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Salazzle
flavorText: Filled with pheromones, its poisonous gas can be diluted to use in the production of luscious perfumes.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Burned. It can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy from this Pokemon.

name: Horsea
flavorText: It makes its nest in the shade of corals. If it senses danger, it spits murky ink and flees.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Horsea
flavorText: It makes its nest in the shade of corals. If it senses danger, it spits murky ink and flees.
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 more damage times the amount of Water Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Seadra
flavorText: It is capable of swimming backwards by rapidly flapping its winglike pectoral fins and stout tail.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of Water Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Kingdra-GX
Attack1Text: This attack does 50 more damage times the amount of Water Energy attached to this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Magikarp
flavorText: Its reckless leaps make it easy pickings for predators. On the bright side, many Pokemon enjoy longer life spans, thanks to Magikarp.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

name: Gyarados
flavorText: There are people who swear that any place Gyarados appears is fated for destruction.
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if this Pokemon is Knocked Out), put 2 damage counters on each of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack1Text: You may discard any Stadium card in play.

name: Lapras
flavorText: These Pokemon were once near extinction due to poaching. Following protective regulations, there is now an overabundance of them.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: This attack does 10 more damage times the amount of Water Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Totodile
flavorText: Its powerful, well-developed jaws are capable of crushing anything. Even its Trainer must be careful.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage for each heads.

name: Croconaw
flavorText: Once it bites down, it won't let go until it loses its fangs. New fangs quickly grow into place.
Attack2Text: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck.

name: Feraligatr
flavorText: When it bites with its massive and powerful jaws, it shakes its head and savagely tears its victim up.
Ability1Text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a Water Energy card from your hand.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 more damage for each Water Energy card in your discard pile. Then, shuffle those cards into your deck.

name: Wooper
flavorText: When the temperature cools in the evening, they emerge from water to seek food along the shore.

name: Quagsire
flavorText: This carefree Pokemon has an easygoing nature. While swimming, it always bumps into boat hulls.
Ability1Text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Water Energy from 1 of your Benched Pokemon to your Active Pokemon.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of Water Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Corsola
flavorText: Pursued by Mareanie for the branches on its head, this Pokemon will sometimes snap its own branches off as a diversion while it escapes.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage times the amount of Water Energy attached to this Pokemon to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Feebas
flavorText: Although unattractive and unpopular, this Pokemon's marvelous vitality has made it a subject of research.
Ability1Text: As long as this Pokemon is on your Bench, prevent all damage done to this Pokemon by attacks (both yours and your opponent's).

name: Milotic
flavorText: It lives at the bottom of clear lakes. In times of war, it shows itself, which soothes people's minds and hearts.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: This attack does 40 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Phione
flavorText: It drifts in warm seas. It always returns to where it was born, no matter how far it may have drifted.
Ability1Text: Your Water Pokemon can't be Confused. If those Pokemon are already Confused, remove that Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Wishiwashi
flavorText: It's awfully weak and notably tasty, so everyone is always out to get it. As it happens, anyone trying to bully it receives a painful lesson.
Ability1Text: Your Wishiwashi-GX in play get +20 HP, and their attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Trapinch
flavorText: As it digs through the sand, its giant jaws crush any rocks that obstruct its path. It builds a funnel-shaped nest.
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Hydreigon
flavorText: The heads on their arms do not have brains. They use all three heads to consume and destroy everything.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may choose 3 of your Benched Pokemon. Then, discard your other Benched Pokemon.
Attack1Text: You may discard an Energy from this Pokemon. If you do, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Dratini
flavorText: After a 10-hour struggle, a fisherman was able to pull one up and confirm its existence.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Dratini
flavorText: After a 10-hour struggle, a fisherman was able to pull one up and confirm its existence.

name: Dragonair
flavorText: From time immemorial, it has been venerated by agricultural peoples as an entity able to control the weather.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 60 damage for each heads.

name: Dragonite-GX
Attack2Text: This Pokemon can't attack during your next turn.

name: Vibrava
flavorText: To help make its wings grow, it dissolves quantities of prey in its digestive juices and guzzles them down every day.
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Flygon
flavorText: This Pokemon hides in the heart of sandstorms it creates and seldom appears where people can see it.
Ability1Text: Prevent all effects of your opponent's attacks, except damage, done to your Dragon Pokemon. (Existing effects are not removed.)
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Altaria
flavorText: On sunny days, it flies freely through the sky and blends into the clouds. It sings in a beautiful soprano.
Ability1Text: Your Dragon Pokemon's attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Altaria
flavorText: On sunny days, it flies freely through the sky and blends into the clouds. It sings in a beautiful soprano.
Ability1Text: Your Dragon Pokemon's attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Altaria-GX
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokemon by attacks from Pokemon-GX and Pokemon-EX.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Bagon
flavorText: With its steel-hard stone head, it headbutts indiscriminately. This is because of the stress it feels at being unable to fly.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.
Attack2Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Shelgon
flavorText: They lurk deep within caves—motionless, neither eating nor drinking. Why they don't die is not known.
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon has any basic Energy attached to it, it takes 20 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Salamence-GX
Ability1Text: Your Pokemon in play have no Retreat Cost, except Pokemon-GX and Pokemon-EX.
Attack1Text: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack does 120 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Druddigon
flavorText: It warms its body by absorbing sunlight with its wings. When its body temperature falls, it can no longer move.
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if this Pokemon is Knocked Out), put 3 damage counters on the Attacking Pokemon.

name: Zekrom
flavorText: Concealing itself in lightning clouds, it flies throughout the Unova region. It creates electricity in its tail.
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokemon does 50 damage to itself.

name: Kyurem
flavorText: It generates a powerful, freezing energy inside itself, but its body became frozen when the energy leaked out.
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: White Kyurem-GX
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If this Pokemon has any damage counters on it, this attack does 80 more damage.

name: Zygarde
flavorText: It's thought to be monitoring the ecosystem. There are rumors that even greater power lies hidden within it.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: If this Pokemon has any damage counters on it, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Turtonator
flavorText: It gushes fire and poisonous gases from its nostrils. Its dung is an explosive substance and can be put to various uses.
Attack1Text: Discard any amount of Fire Energy from your Pokemon. This attack does 50 damage for each card you discarded in this way.

name: Drampa
flavorText: This Pokemon is friendly to people and loves children most of all. It comes from deep in the mountains to play with children it likes in town.
Attack1Text: Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Dragon Pokemon.

name: Jangmo-o
flavorText: They live in mountains where no trace of humans can be detected. Jangmo-o grow little by little as they battle one another.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokemon takes 20 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Hakamo-o
flavorText: It sheds and regrows its scales on a continuous basis. The scales become harder and sharper each time they're regrown.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokemon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Kommo-o
flavorText: Its rigid scales function as offense and defense. In the past, its scales were processed and used to make weapons and other commodities.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokemon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: If this Pokemon has 8 or more damage counters on it, this attack does 120 more damage.

name: Kangaskhan
flavorText: The child in its pouch leaves home after roughly three years. That is the only time the mother is heard to cry wildly.
Attack1Text: Draw a card.

name: Swablu
flavorText: It constantly grooms its cotton-like wings. It takes a shower to clean itself if it becomes dirty.
Attack1Text: Draw a card.

name: Swablu
flavorText: It constantly grooms its cotton-like wings. It takes a shower to clean itself if it becomes dirty.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Reshiram-GX
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Fire Energy cards and attach them to this Pokemon. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack2Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Kingdra-GX
Attack1Text: This attack does 50 more damage times the amount of Water Energy attached to this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Dragonite-GX
Attack2Text: This Pokemon can't attack during your next turn.

name: Altaria-GX
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokemon by attacks from Pokemon-GX and Pokemon-EX.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Reshiram-GX
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Fire Energy cards and attach them to this Pokemon. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack2Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Altaria-GX
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokemon by attacks from Pokemon-GX and Pokemon-EX.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Salamence-GX
Ability1Text: Your Pokemon in play have no Retreat Cost, except Pokemon-GX and Pokemon-EX.
Attack1Text: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack does 120 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: White Kyurem-GX
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If this Pokemon has any damage counters on it, this attack does 80 more damage.

name: Ultra Necrozma-GX
Attack1Text: Discard all basic Psychic Energy from this Pokemon. This attack does 80 more damage for each card you discarded in this way.
Attack2Text: You can use this attack only if the total of both players' remaining Prize cards is 6 or less. Put 6 damage counters on each of your opponent's Pokemon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
